entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:54 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -34.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 02:27 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
